,MooN_sHiNe88,2011-03-22T21:15Z,"Ok, I DL'ed the game and suffered from these 2 problems:

with this installation should be ""09 April 2010 14.04""
(NB: Other DLL file in the 7zip archive in games main folder is the original that comes with vanilla game - DONT TOUCH THAT! If you
unzip and replace the other with THAT you'll start getting ""CD"" prompts)
